name: electorally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is related to an election: He was the most electorally successful leader in the party's history. It's the middle class that interests us most, electorally. See
electoral
More examplesFewer examplesThe party must balance competing arguments from lobbyists, particularly in electorally sensitive areas.It would seem there is a tendency for relief aid to gravitate towards electorally powerful states.He’ll be held accountable electorally by the voters.
